trans-unit.source: Configuration for import or export of files to/from FTP servers and the local file system. For local paths outside the web root, don't forget to set $GLOBALS['TYPO3_CONF_VARS']['BE']['lockRootPath'].
Disabled configurations are ignored when the Scheduler task is set to run all configurations.
Enter some useful title. This field is purely informational.
Path from which files will be imported or exported.
Path to which file will be imported or exported.
Comma-separated list of file extensions to match (e.g. "csv,txt").
Consider setting this to a restrictive set of extensions for security reasons. Leaving this field empty will allow all files to be imported/exported. Wildcards are not supported.
FTP server involved in the import/export process.
User name on the FTP server.
User password on the FTP server.
Type of transfer. An import will fetch files from the FTP server and store them locally. An export will push local files to the FTP server.
What action to perform after files were transferred. Note that only successfully transferred files are affected.
The path to which the files will be moved, if the post-processing action is of type "move".
